plot: Blackthorne and Mariko test their new alliance as they train Toranaga's gun regiment for war. Yabushige must navigate his past promises to Ishido when an old friend comes to the village.

Blackthorne, Toranaga and company land in Ajiro, a village in Yabushige's fiefdom. This is where Blackthorne will train the gun regiment. Due to being elevated to hatamoto, Blackthorne now has his own house, servants...and consort, an unwilling one. He sets to work training the gun regiment.—grantss
